website_summaries.verdict: Extremely affordable, but do not skimp on comfort or insulation. We recommend ordering a size larger, but the fit should still be very snug.
pros: Thick wool lining, but decent finger dexterity

customer_reviews.title: ... are warm but when i received them have a terrible smell, even after i hand washed them the ...
customer_reviews.text: they are warm but when i received them have a terrible smell, even after i hand washed them the smell persists. Update **** the company emailed me and refunded me my purchase price. Very good customer service
customer_reviews.author: Viggen

customer_reviews.title: Thick and oh so warm!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a woman who is very glad that I purchased these gloves. Brown & blue has always been my favorite color combination so that was what initially caught my eye. Received them in the promised timeline and was genuinely amazed at their thickness. I have nerve damage in my hands and cannot tolerate cold temps. These gloves are fantastic and offered at such a low price. I’ve purchased so many gloves just looking for a pair to provide relief from the cold and pain. Wore them the other day in lower 20 temps. Fantastic! They have stretch and fit snugly. Going to order several more pairs. Recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are exceptionally nice gloves. the price was very small
customer_reviews.text: These are exceptionally nice gloves. the price was very small, but the gloves are fantastic. they are not waterproof, however, so do not use to clear the windshield!! they are nice and warm and very cozy. I want more!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Warm, flexible, and comfortable - Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are exceptionally high quality and fitted my needs exactly - when I go to Navy PT on cold mornings, they keep my hands warm and flexible while showing no logo, allowing me to wear them in uniform. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Average gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves to wear during winters in VA. They aren't quite warm enough for me but my hands run colder than most. My real complaint however is that the fit in the fingers is fairly poor. The thumb is much too long and I can't really make use of my phone because of the floppy fingertips. Wish they were little bit more Superior in terms of quality
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Smelly!
customer_reviews.text: The gloves smelled very badly like a solvent or wet towel on the garage floor after a few months. After the second wash and the second turned inside out, they are manageable so buyer beware. Rated low because of this and the time it took to get the gloves wearable. Needless to say, you can't wear they until you correct the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Was not expecting this caliber of quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are really great gloves, especially for $8. I was expecting some really thin, cheap gloves which wouldn't last but these are extremely thick compared to what you'd expect, and very warm. I used them while running and have zero complaints, in fact my arms get cold inside my layers more quickly than my hands do. Great gloves, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Umber

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable - not just for men
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 4-5 pairs of these gloves for myself and family members. They're comfortable, very warm, and suitable for men or women. Colors may be a little on the masculine side, but I don't care. My lady-hands are average size and they fit me well but stretch enough for my son-in-law to wear. I think they would be too large for kids, but fine for just about everyone else. I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: kps27

customer_reviews.title: Warm by smelled bad
customer_reviews.text: These gloves look great and are warm. My only problem is the smell. They smell like dry cleaning fluid. I plan to wash them; should be good to go after that. If they didn't have this awful odor, I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Constricting and poor insulation
customer_reviews.text: Great colour and very thick. From looking at it, they look like the perfect pair of gloves. Once you wear them, it's a very different story. I live in Chicago, so it gets very cold and windy. The gloves did not keep me warm outside. The material is so thick that it constricts blood flow into your hands. It is also poorly insulated, so cold air easily seeps through. Little blood flow + cold air = cold hands. Also, the proportions of the fingers are strange. When I put them on, the palms are too big and the fingers too short. I guess it reduces constriction.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Thick!  Warm!.....and seemingly high quality
customer_reviews.text: Received these yesterday and broke them in yesterday night at the Eagles MNF game (Go Birds!) . Temperatures were only in the high 30s/low 40s but these gloves got the job done. They are surprisingly thick and plush, comfortable and I'd say stylish. My only complaint is minor - the internal finger section pulls back and separates a little from the external portion when removing the gloves - almost like it slips in towards your palm when you remove them. They popped right back into place when you put them on again. Obviously, will have to see how they hold up over time, but for $8 I am very happy with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley

customer_reviews.title: A very good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he loves them. They are easy to get on and off (he has arthritis in his hands), and very soft and cozy. The temperature was only in the 30s with a strong wind blowing when he wore them on Christmas and he stayed warm even though he walks very slowly and uses a walker so his hands are out there where it's cold. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Umlaut

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gloves for the price!
customer_reviews.text: While certainly not the most exquisite fit, these gloves are extremely reasonably priced and work quite well to keep hands warm. Keep in mind that knitted wool-lined gloves are NOT waterproof, so these do tend to soak through over time unlike more modern water-resistant materials. Still, for regular wear and light activity (such as scraping a car window), these are more than sufficient and you can't beat the value.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell that won't come out.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband, but they smelled like they were stored in a musty old basement. I washed them several times, and although the smell has lessened, it's still there. Also, drying them twice caused them to shrink. Now they're mine. They are nice and thick, so I'll use them for shoveling.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable fit, warm (40-60F degrees; up to 1 hr in 30'sF degrees). Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and is very comfortable. Not tight. These fit great in the fingers - nice ample room yet not baggy in the wrist. Has a nice stretch to it. Great for work, school, camping/hiking/jogging/shoveling snow. Warm (e.g. excellent for 40 degrees to 60 degrees or for a quick shoveling of snow in 30 degree weather), yet not too thick that you lose dexterity. Warmer than bicycle gloves. The softest (fleece-like) material on the inside. Not for skiing because they would get too wet and aren't warm enough for an all-day in freezing conditions. Excellent for a commute to work by train even in freezing temperatures above 30 where you are outside for up to an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gloves- super warm
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful gloves- super warm, and look nice too! My wife is so relieved I am not wearing Wells Lamont cotton gloves with wool liners anymore. Sure, they are warm, and very functional... but hideous. Now, I am warm and also- a gentleman! I will wear my cotton gloves with wool liner when I am on my tractor, or using tools- no longer to the grocery store, or the bank!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Keep me warm!!!
customer_reviews.text: This gloves came perfectly on time since I need it for Lake Tahoe trip. I only need when I came outside of the hotel and it does very good job to keep my hand warm. The material is made from knit. It is very flexible and light weight to fit in luggage. There is nothing to complain for its price. However, this glove is not waterproof or water resistant. This gloves can’t be used to built snow man for sure. Ps: This product was offered for testing. I tried to provide my honest review as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Juni N

customer_reviews.title: People were not lying about the smell. Musty is the best way I can describe it.
customer_reviews.text: As overall feel goes for the gloves they are great. Exactly what i was looking for. But...the smell of them is such a turn away. Musty is best way i can put it. " But dude just wash them" Yeah I did. Twice. I also sprayed them with alcohol hoping to kill any and all smell. Didn't work. If I find a fix for the smell I'll post it but otherwise I'm not wearing them atm.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Ambidextrious warm gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves if your not doing anything but walking in the cold, wind or rain they keep your hands dry and toasty for a good while. Downside is if you try to do anything manual at all they wont help you'll drop your phone/tool or anything youd normally need to hold and they feel like your wearing cartoon gloves. On the plus side you can put either one on either hand
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Lathers

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are amazing! I'm pretty sensitive to the cold
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are amazing! I'm pretty sensitive to the cold, especially being from Florida so when I traveled to Yosemite for a camping trip during the winter, these gloves were absolutely amazing. The material is soft and flexible like it should be and when worn, it hugs the skin very well, doesn't feel constricting at all. I have also thrown these in the wash a few times and the color and material is still like new. Great gloves for those looking for the most bang for their buck.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy H

customer_reviews.title: Fit humans with normal non-alien like fingers.
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how long I have searched to find large mens gloves that don't make me feel like I have the fingers of a toddler. I can never find gloves for my hand size that also match my fingers. Just to note, I don't have tiny sausage fingers. These gloves fit perfectly and have stretched nicely after a few wearings. They are also warm, not scratchy very nice gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Twain

customer_reviews.title: the other was fine.
customer_reviews.text: I had to send for a refund... I may try and order one more pair and i'll update my review then, but i had high hopes for these. There were white strings visible and coming apart all over one glove, the other was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Harris

customer_reviews.title: GOOD GLOVES
customer_reviews.text: Gloves are warm and snug fitting. They are flat, but they do not feel awkward or uncomfortable like other flat gloves, probably because of the acrylic fabric (which I have found to outlast cotton). I threw them into the wash & dry, and the wool bunched up a little, but you only need to guide the wool back into the acrylic fingers. Worth the money. I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES KALUNA

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These winter gloves are great. I live in north Texas and during the winter it gets very cold. Those gloves are perfect for the winter. Sometimes, I use them to clean my car and do numerous thing around the house. Be careful not to mistake it for a heavy duty gloves because you might hurt yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Gershon Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Super warm and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I bought these gloves for my husband and I have worn them a few times and they're awesome! They have the durability of cheap knit gloves but the warmth of ski gloves. You can play in the snow and make snowballs or whatever and your hands will stay dry and warm. I may just buy another pair for myself. These are a life saver and so warm. Fair price and worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Renee

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: This product is good for regular cold weather, but when it get really cold you can not rely on this. Also if you do a work that heavily involve your hand; you might want to look for another option.
customer_reviews.author: senan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality gloves
customer_reviews.text: These will work well for me. I live where the winters are harsh. These will work well to clean the snow off of the car. They will also be good for walking outdoors since I walk a couple of blocks to and from work. They seem to keep the wind out well. I wouldn't wear them for snow sports but they are great for casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Dandrea

customer_reviews.title: These gloves shed
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are warm enough and fit well. The problem I'm having is that they shed the outer fabric. The outer material pills and sloughs off. I don't know how long this will last. Other than that, these are fine gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy C

customer_reviews.title: Warm and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them. We both walk the dogs at night (I got a women's pair for myself) and needed warm, inexpensive gloves. These look very nice and they're very warm for less than $10. Also, they're the same on the back of the hand as the palm of the hand which looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: T. Land

customer_reviews.title: I like'em
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and great fitting. Good for keeping your hands warm while driving and just being out and about in cold weather. But I wouldn't want to use them for any form of outdoor work, even shoveling snow. Aside from the fact they wouldn't hold up very well, if they get wet they're useless. But I imagine they'd be excellent liners inside leather work gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Warm and durable men's gloves
customer_reviews.text: The LETHMIK men's gloves are very durable and warm. I was looking for a reasonable price pair of gloves to wear while driving,and, keep my hands warm. The lining is soft, not itchy, and the knit outer area has kept its shape and not gotten any holes. I received them in two days, thanks to Amazon's shipping. I would buy another pair of gloves from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: AK Bashaw

customer_reviews.title: They Turn Inside Out When Taking them Off
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were definitely warm, but I ended up throwing them away because the inner liner is not sewn in to the fingers, only the wrist, so when you go to take the gloves off, the inside of the gloves fingers some with you and get all balled up and knotted up, making them difficult to get back on. I would look somewhere else if I were you as this was a very annoying problem.
customer_reviews.author: 2016Williams

customer_reviews.title: these are warmer and more comfortable than the expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son as a replacement for some very expensive gloves he lost. According to him, these are warmer and more comfortable than the expensive ones! He lives in Boston and is using them with their cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: I went to a big box store with a “W” in its name in mid January to by gloves. They were out because the were getting ready for spring stuff. But, since it still is cold and snowy in January, I still need gloves. These are thick and warm and a good value for the price. I will buy a few more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: SteveO

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Warm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these gloves for a trip to Russia this year. I went in December and January and was expecting it to be very cold. These gloves were fantastic they kept my hands toasty warm no matter how cold it got outside and there were several times it dropped down into the negatives temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Clockworks

customer_reviews.title: What made them so great for driving made them a hindrance at work
customer_reviews.text: Extremely thick and warm. I wanted them because my hands were in pain from the cold in the morning and it was getting hard to drive. These fixed that up real quick. However, I still needed something for work in the morning and let me tell you: it is impossible to type with these. What made them so great for driving made them a hindrance at work. Would I buy them again? Absolutely. They're stylish and warm and perfect for at least one task. It's a shame I can't keep them on. If I could, you'd never see me without them.
customer_reviews.author: Conner Robles

customer_reviews.title: wife and kids all wear them and love them.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gloves. My wife and kids all wear them and love them. Repeat customer. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: TryItFixItTryIt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to keep my hands warm while doing barn chores. They are very nice quality, and soft and plush. Exceeded my expectations. Love the price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Whitehorse

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Warm
customer_reviews.text: They look like just run of the mill knit gloves, but they're surprisingly warm. It was just 20 below zero wind chill and I barely felt it through these. There's a nice puffy padding around the fingers. They run a little tight but I imagine they'll stretch out a bit.
customer_reviews.author: R. Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hands warm, bulky and not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: It does keep my fingers warm while driving in the cold. However some of the stitches is beginning to fall apart after one wash in my washing machine. Plus it is too bulky for long term driving.
customer_reviews.author: StayAtHomeDad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the polar vortex!
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I bought since I lent the first pair and they were lost. But they wear well, are very warm, fit either hand very nicely. You can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of gloves
customer_reviews.text: Just recently got to use these gloves during our recent snow storm and they were just awesome. We did a lot of outdoor activities in the snow and my hands stayed warm the WHOLE time. Even making a snowman my hands never did get wet. I would advise anyone to by these gloves if they love keeping their hands warm in cold weather. Great cold weather accessory.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Soft
customer_reviews.text: I like these gloves a lot. Very warm, soft and thick. They feel like they are cushioned due to their thickness. Fit perfect, ambidextrous and good looking. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph White

customer_reviews.title: Best gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are the warmest gloves I have ever worn. Even when clearing off snow on my cars my hands stay dry and warm. They also air dry quickly. They are easy to use when driving allowing me to easily use all the controls in my car. They fit perfectly and are the best gloves I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: J. Berkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 15 years old son, fit him perfectly...it will run a little small for an adult (even with a medium size hand) Well constructed abd very warm
customer_reviews.author: Moises H.

customer_reviews.title: Warm but a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Very warm gloves -- lining is wool, exterior something else. They come in "one size fits all" and I must advise, they are small. I generally wear a men's medium size and these are a bit on the tight on me.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Warm gloves without loosing dexterity in a working environment I move freight in a freezer and they are warm enough for me ... that being said they are a little on the snug side around the fingers
customer_reviews.author: JustAnormalGirL

customer_reviews.title: Super Warm and Soft
customer_reviews.text: Super warm. Very soft and comfortable. Fit like a champ. And look very nice. Don't get them wet or play in the snow with them, not for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing

customer_reviews.title: I work in construction and yesterday was 5 degrees Fahrenheit ...
customer_reviews.text: I work in construction and yesterday was 5 degrees Fahrenheit and these gloves kept my hands warm all day not many gloves can even keep that promise!
customer_reviews.author: Jaysun14

customer_reviews.title: Better than average
customer_reviews.text: Much better than run of the mill gloves, may have slightly funny smell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gloves inner lining was a bit too tight. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Gloves inner lining was a bit too tight. I have big but by not means overly large hands. My hands never really warmed up if they were already cold when I put these on.
customer_reviews.author: bret osborne

customer_reviews.title: OK, I guess...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are not what I expected...I wanted warm gloves for hunting, but these are more like driving gloves.They're ok I guess and cheap enough.
customer_reviews.author: Frank D. Anselmo

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm wool thats not itchy at all
customer_reviews.text: Needed some warm gloves for the winter and these fit the bill perfectly. I didn't need a touch phone finger glove but I did need something to light a lighter with and these gloves allow you to light one. Nice and warm wool thats not itchy at all. Great set of gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great, not bad...
customer_reviews.text: Initially and for short durations, toasty warm. However, after about twenty minutes, the chill sets in. Went jogging with them in low 30's temps. End of run the fingers were cold.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Warm, but...
customer_reviews.text: They should attach the inner glove to the outer glove somehow, so that the fingers of the inner glove don't pull out of the fingers of the outer glove when taking off the gloves. Also you can hear some stitches ripping when pulling the glove on tight. Otherwise, they are pretty damn warm.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: smelled like mold as soon as i opened the package
customer_reviews.text: smelled like mold as soon as i opened the package. Gloves were supposed to be one size fits all, but it runs a hair big.
customer_reviews.author: The Guerra's

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: They are too small and hard to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Warm, They Are
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove. Wish I had them while attending graduate school in Buffalo/Niagara, the weather up there is like in the Baltic region. Although I reside in Florida, the gloves will be by my side , while I explore the Baltic region in the upcoming months.. They fit good, price was excellent, and WARM. great product/buy
customer_reviews.author: John A. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: They smell, but not forever
customer_reviews.text: They do smell like they were stored in a timber warehouse, as other people have posted here. But they are the warmest pair of non-snow gloves I've owned. They are my go to gloves right now and do not smell as bad as they once did.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Very warm gloves and good fit. The only problem is the terrible smell ...
customer_reviews.text: Very warm gloves and good fit. The only problem is the terrible smell they have since I received them, hoping this eventually will go away!
customer_reviews.author: Raw C

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: No smell that other reviews gave. Not a snow shoveling glove but for keeping hands warm, they did the trick. Works in cold weather but would suggest a different glove if going to be exposed for longer times. Decent for driving or quick walks.
customer_reviews.author: Jim O

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit well, and are very comfortable. They are quite thick and soft and they keep my hands warm which many pairs of gloves don't do so I think they are excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I like 'em !
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for me here in Southern Utah. Gets in the 20's , sometimes in the teens but we do get some snow. They do have a bit of a smell, kinda like kerosene but not too bad. Over-all, I like 'em. I'm a man with medium/large hands and they fit good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Paull

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly warm gloves
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how thick and warm these were for the price. These gloves kept my hands warm in 35 degree weather. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Came with pulls, right out of the box. Seams like it would not hold up ether. I guess these would be good, if you didn't have to do anything with your hands & the gloves just sit their, keeping your hands worm :{
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: i bought these for my boyfriend to wear while he ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought these for my boyfriend to wear while he rides his bike in the winter. he absolutely loves them! they are thick, warm, fit perfectly and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but too small
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a large hand but the gloves are somewhat small. They are comfortable and seem to be of good quality. I will use them but not as much as I planned because of their smallness.
customer_reviews.author: wayne voigt

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are seriously fantastic! Thick and warm--although the colors on the cuffs ...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are seriously fantastic! Thick and warm--although the colors on the cuffs are a little goofy. The gray have a rust color around the cuff, and the black have a light blue. Not a deal breaker, not by a long shot, but just be aware. If they can survive a MN winter, they can survive anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher MN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE GLOVES! Use them whenever I go out in winter! It's been almost a year!
customer_reviews.author: Great Ingvar

customer_reviews.title: Poor Stitching
customer_reviews.text: I live in a year round warm climate and needed pair of gloves for just one week for business travel. I put a glove on for just thirty seconds and noticed the stitching was beginning to fall apart. I doubt if the gloves would have lasted one week. I returned the gloves for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: JustinBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Warm in Colorado
customer_reviews.text: Husband used these in Colorado and kept his hands warm. We did not use with snow though
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Super warm!
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say these are not the prettiest gloves but they are the warmest. I both two pairs for my twin teenage boys who coach winter rugby. They wore them all the time. 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ladylaw

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves, Thick knit, Flexible feel
customer_reviews.text: I work in cold weather where you have to write down things with a pen, I liked that these gloves were thick but still could grab a pen out of pocket with no problem the feel is soft and warm.
customer_reviews.author: SCRATCH MASTER DEE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The quality and the fit are very good. It keeps you warm in temperatures ~ 25 but you can feel the breeze when its windy, even with 30deg.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I ordered these. Went on a trip to north Idaho & north Montana in February. Lots of time spent outdoors in temperatures 24 degrees or less at times (sightseeing) and these gloves kept my hands warm the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: universal thumbs!
customer_reviews.text: Warm and stretchy, but what he likes most is that either glove fits either hand.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my fast walk in the morning good for about 27, 28 degrees
customer_reviews.author: JMD

customer_reviews.title: Hands Cold even in 54 degree weather
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are very comfortable and fit properly, but they did not keep my hands any warmer than they are without gloves, even in 54 degrees. I returned them because I need gloves that keep my hands warm.
customer_reviews.author: Denoz

customer_reviews.title: These are nice gloves and warm
customer_reviews.text: These are nice gloves and warm. I wear them at work in a 30 degree environment and they keep my hands mostly warm. This is my second pair after my first pair gave up on me after 4 months of heavy use. Great 👍 gloves for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Umberto De La Roacha

customer_reviews.title: Warm and look nice.
customer_reviews.text: These fit me really well and they're a combination of just tight enough and just spacious enough. They're warm and they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeep

customer_reviews.title: These gloves is OK but you can't stay outside too ...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves is OK but you can't stay outside too long or your finger tips will freeze. I was using my snowblower and after blowing mine and my neighbors driveway, my fingers froze
customer_reviews.author: Marco E.

customer_reviews.title: unbeatable price for such quality!
customer_reviews.text: this is my second purchase of these gloves for my son, who lost his first pair. this time i bought two more pairs for him to take with him as he goes off to college in vermont. great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: brenda elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Snug
customer_reviews.text: The thickest softest and warmest gloves I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Quality gloves for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The pair I received did have a few loose threads, but otherwise they have met or exceeded all of my expectations. They will eventually get soaked through in wet conditions, but it takes a very long time. They are quite warm and comfortable. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Phaedrus

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for cold weather!
customer_reviews.text: You can pick up a pair of gloves similar to the ones I bought from you for a dollar at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: very warm and pretty wind resistant. Wore them in 20 degree weather and barely felt the cold.
customer_reviews.author: tog the baker

customer_reviews.title: It feels thick and comfortable but it doesn't keep my hands decently warm and ...
customer_reviews.text: Chemical smell lasted 2 weeks with normal wear. Bought these for the cold mornings when driving to work. It feels thick and comfortable but it doesn't keep my hands decently warm and it feels like the cold comes through moderately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick and warm
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, insulated, warm gloves, even in this recent brutal cold. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: he said they are great for keeping his hands warm on the job
customer_reviews.text: Got there for my Grandson. .who has a job in construction. .working outside Inn the cold....he said they are great for keeping his hands warm on the job. .
customer_reviews.author: 5..nails

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Very warm. I live in NJ and it's very cold. These are light weight and warm. Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Queen

customer_reviews.title: warm gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are warm. Not too thick. A little bit slick on my hands but not too bad. They are very warm even in wind. I haven't been in the rain with them yet but I have been in some damp misty conditions and the warmth did not degrade.
customer_reviews.author: BThor

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are a nice addition to my walking routine. At times the cold air is uncomfortable on my hands. The gloves are comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: StanTheMan

customer_reviews.title: Must have for cold snowy days
customer_reviews.text: Material is soft and has good elasticity, also it is thick. Kept my hands warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Jacob

customer_reviews.title: nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves but a little short at the wrist. Fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Kennet M. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Wow i really love these gloves
customer_reviews.text: Wow i really love these gloves...honestly i was surprised by the quality and warmth of these gloves considering they are only $7. I plan on getting a second pair soon they are that good.
customer_reviews.author: Emir

customer_reviews.title: Warm gloves
customer_reviews.text: A little snug, but they look good and work well
customer_reviews.author: Jeff J

customer_reviews.title: Super warm!
customer_reviews.text: This gloves turned out to be much better and warmer than i expected. Bought another one for my dad. THats how good this one is!
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Banerji

customer_reviews.title: These are great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves! They are super warm. They are somewhat thick so don’t expect much finger dexterity but that’s not why I bought them. They keep your hands from getting cold! I’m happy with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Generalrem

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and warm . Great quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good handwarming product
customer_reviews.text: A reasonably priced pair of gloves that more than provide good protection for your hands from the cold👏
customer_reviews.author: Barry D Wilson

product_meta.title: LETHMIK Mens Winter Thick Gloves Black Knit with Warm Wool Lining
product_meta.description:
LETHMIK Kint Gloves. 
LETHMIK Mens Winter Thick Black Knit Gloves with Warm Wool Lining; this gloves is made of High Quality THICK Acrylic Material with super soft and warm Wool lined, The unique and plain wool Knitted, Build a solid and stylish Knit Construction style, very Thick and Warm gloves design, A wonderful item for wearing in cold winter while skiing, snowboarding, skating, sledding, snowshoeing, camping, hiking or any outdoor sports and activities; Comfortable and high quality gloves material with excellent elasticity, Stretches to fit most hands, You can easily get a custom fit according to your hands. Pair off with your favorite Outfit. It's an excellent choice for Gifts or Your Own Dressing. Buy more for your friends and family. 
Please check genuine authentic item tag to avoid counterfeit products.Counterfeiters are capable of copying the appearance of lethmik items but there're no "LETHMIK" tags and our packing. 
Product Care Instructions:Do not wash by hot water; Do not chlorine bleaching; Hang dry in shade; Do not iron; Hand Wash or Spot clean recommended! Please Try Not to Machine Wash or Brush Wash (In order to avoid Pilling). 
Our customer service Email address is: customerservice@lethmik.com ; You can feel free to contact us if you would have any questions, and we will try our best to bring you with the best services. 
LETHMIK brand Philosophy is that We are tending to the men and women who seeks Sleek style and High quality products at a reasonable price. We take a great pride in the quality of our products and the fact that it can be purchased at a price that makes everybody satisfied. LETHMIK does a great design and quality of our Products in the professional way.
